Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 118th overall pick, by San Francisco in 2014...
Injured on 7/18/2014 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Injured on 7/8/2016 with a Inflamed Achilles Tendon, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from San Francisco to Minnesota on 7/7/2017 (Going to SF: P R. Vaca. Going to MIN: P G. Balfour, 3B M. Kavanagh Jr.)...
Had first career hit on 4/3/2018, off Bud Norris (OAK)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/13/2018, off Andy Sonnanstine (NYA)...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/23/2018, hitting .379 with 4 HR, 13 RBI...
Injured on 4/15/2020 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for one week...
Drove in 6 runs against Cleveland on 8/7/2022...
Signed as a free agent by Seattle on 2/2/2024 to a 2-year deal worth $450,000 per year...
